>
[The Hidden Truth](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2507)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 75

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Hidden Truth_ represents the act of observing something beyond the obvious to gain obscure lore. As long as this card is invested, you gain a +2 item bonus to [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) checks made to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), and to all checks made to [Research](/Actions.aspx?ID=519) while using the [Research](/Rules.aspx?ID=1205) subsystem from the _Gamemastery Guide_. This increases to a +3 bonus if you are at least 17th level.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You cast [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344). The level of the spell is one-half your level, rounded down (minimum 6th level). If you're at least 17th-level, you can affect up to three adjacent willing targets with this spell at the same time as you cast it.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
